00106 DdNode *
00107 Cudd_addApply(
00108   DdManager * dd,
00109   DdNode * (*op)(DdManager *, DdNode **, DdNode **),
00110   DdNode * f,
00111   DdNode * g)
00112 {
00113     DdNode *res;
00114 
00115     do {
00116         dd->reordered = 0;
00117         res = cuddAddApplyRecur(dd,op,f,g);
00118     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00119     return(res);
00120 
00121 } /* end of Cudd_addApply */

00136 DdNode *
00137 Cudd_addPlus(
00138   DdManager * dd,
00139   DdNode ** f,
00140   DdNode ** g)
00141 {
00142     DdNode *res;
00143     DdNode *F, *G;
00144     CUDD_VALUE_TYPE value;
00145 
00146     F = *f; G = *g;
00147     if (F == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(G);
00148     if (G == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(F);
00149     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) {
00150         value = cuddV(F)+cuddV(G);
00151         res = cuddUniqueConst(dd,value);
00152         return(res);
00153     }
00154     if (F > G) { /* swap f and g */
00155         *f = G;
00156         *g = F;
00157     }
00158     return(NULL);
00159 
00160 } /* end of Cudd_addPlus */

00175 DdNode *
00176 Cudd_addTimes(
00177   DdManager * dd,
00178   DdNode ** f,
00179   DdNode ** g)
00180 {
00181     DdNode *res;
00182     DdNode *F, *G;
00183     CUDD_VALUE_TYPE value;
00184 
00185     F = *f; G = *g;
00186     if (F == DD_ZERO(dd) || G == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(DD_ZERO(dd));
00187     if (F == DD_ONE(dd)) return(G);
00188     if (G == DD_ONE(dd)) return(F);
00189     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) {
00190         value = cuddV(F)*cuddV(G);
00191         res = cuddUniqueConst(dd,value);
00192         return(res);
00193     }
00194     if (F > G) { /* swap f and g */
00195         *f = G;
00196         *g = F;
00197     }
00198     return(NULL);
00199 
00200 } /* end of Cudd_addTimes */

00215 DdNode *
00216 Cudd_addThreshold(
00217   DdManager * dd,
00218   DdNode ** f,
00219   DdNode ** g)
00220 {
00221     DdNode *F, *G;
00222 
00223     F = *f; G = *g;
00224     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) {
00225         if (cuddV(F) >= cuddV(G)) {
00226             return(F);
00227         } else {
00228             return(DD_ZERO(dd));
00229         }
00230     }
00231     return(NULL);
00232 
00233 } /* end of Cudd_addThreshold */

00248 DdNode *
00249 Cudd_addSetNZ(
00250   DdManager * dd,
00251   DdNode ** f,
00252   DdNode ** g)
00253 {
00254     DdNode *F, *G;
00255 
00256     F = *f; G = *g;
00257     if (F == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(G);
00258     if (G == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(F);
00259     if (cuddIsConstant(G)) return(G);
00260     return(NULL);
00261 
00262 } /* end of Cudd_addSetNZ */

00277 DdNode *
00278 Cudd_addDivide(
00279   DdManager * dd,
00280   DdNode ** f,
00281   DdNode ** g)
00282 {
00283     DdNode *res;
00284     DdNode *F, *G;
00285     CUDD_VALUE_TYPE value;
00286 
00287     F = *f; G = *g;
00288     if (F == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(DD_ZERO(dd));
00289     if (G == DD_ONE(dd)) return(F);
00290     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) {
00291         value = cuddV(F)/cuddV(G);
00292         res = cuddUniqueConst(dd,value);
00293         return(res);
00294     }
00295     return(NULL);
00296 
00297 } /* end of Cudd_addDivide */

00312 DdNode *
00313 Cudd_addMinus(
00314   DdManager * dd,
00315   DdNode ** f,
00316   DdNode ** g)
00317 {
00318     DdNode *res;
00319     DdNode *F, *G;
00320     CUDD_VALUE_TYPE value;
00321 
00322     F = *f; G = *g;
00323     if (F == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(cuddAddNegateRecur(dd,G));
00324     if (G == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(F);
00325     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) {
00326         value = cuddV(F)-cuddV(G);
00327         res = cuddUniqueConst(dd,value);
00328         return(res);
00329     }
00330     return(NULL);
00331 
00332 } /* end of Cudd_addMinus */

00347 DdNode *
00348 Cudd_addMinimum(
00349   DdManager * dd,
00350   DdNode ** f,
00351   DdNode ** g)
00352 {
00353     DdNode *F, *G;
00354 
00355     F = *f; G = *g;
00356     if (F == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(G);
00357     if (G == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(F);
00358 #if 0
00359     /* These special cases probably do not pay off. */
00360     if (F == DD_MINUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(F);
00361     if (G == DD_MINUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(G);
00362 #endif
00363     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) {
00364         if (cuddV(F) <= cuddV(G)) {
00365             return(F);
00366         } else {
00367             return(G);
00368         }
00369     }
00370     if (F > G) { /* swap f and g */
00371         *f = G;
00372         *g = F;
00373     }
00374     return(NULL);
00375 
00376 } /* end of Cudd_addMinimum */

00391 DdNode *
00392 Cudd_addMaximum(
00393   DdManager * dd,
00394   DdNode ** f,
00395   DdNode ** g)
00396 {
00397     DdNode *F, *G;
00398 
00399     F = *f; G = *g;
00400     if (F == DD_MINUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(G);
00401     if (G == DD_MINUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(F);
00402 #if 0
00403     /* These special cases probably do not pay off. */
00404     if (F == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(F);
00405     if (G == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(G);
00406 #endif
00407     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) {
00408         if (cuddV(F) >= cuddV(G)) {
00409             return(F);
00410         } else {
00411             return(G);
00412         }
00413     }
00414     if (F > G) { /* swap f and g */
00415         *f = G;
00416         *g = F;
00417     }
00418     return(NULL);
00419 
00420 } /* end of Cudd_addMaximum */

00436 DdNode *
00437 Cudd_addOneZeroMaximum(
00438   DdManager * dd,
00439   DdNode ** f,
00440   DdNode ** g)
00441 {
00442 
00443     if (*g == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd))
00444         return DD_ZERO(dd);
00445     if (cuddIsConstant(*f) && cuddIsConstant(*g)) {
00446         if (cuddV(*f) > cuddV(*g)) {
00447             return(DD_ONE(dd));
00448         } else {
00449             return(DD_ZERO(dd));
00450         }
00451     }
00452 
00453     return(NULL);
00454 
00455 } /* end of Cudd_addOneZeroMaximum */

00470 DdNode *
00471 Cudd_addDiff(
00472   DdManager * dd,
00473   DdNode ** f,
00474   DdNode ** g)
00475 {
00476     DdNode *F, *G;
00477 
00478     F = *f; G = *g;
00479     if (F == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(G);
00480     if (G == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(F);
00481     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) {
00482         if (cuddV(F) != cuddV(G)) {
00483             if (cuddV(F) < cuddV(G)) {
00484                 return(F);
00485             } else {
00486                 return(G);
00487             }
00488         } else {
00489             return(dd->plusinfinity);
00490         }
00491     }
00492     return(NULL);
00493 
00494 } /* end of Cudd_addDiff */

00509 DdNode *
00510 Cudd_addAgreement(
00511   DdManager * dd,
00512   DdNode ** f,
00513   DdNode ** g)
00514 {
00515     DdNode *F, *G;
00516 
00517     F = *f; G = *g;
00518     if (F == G) return(F);
00519     if (F == dd->background) return(F);
00520     if (G == dd->background) return(G);
00521     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) return(dd->background);
00522     return(NULL);
00523 
00524 } /* end of Cudd_addAgreement */

00539 DdNode *
00540 Cudd_addOr(
00541   DdManager * dd,
00542   DdNode ** f,
00543   DdNode ** g)
00544 {
00545     DdNode *F, *G;
00546 
00547     F = *f; G = *g;
00548     if (F == DD_ONE(dd) || G == DD_ONE(dd)) return(DD_ONE(dd));
00549     if (cuddIsConstant(F)) return(G);
00550     if (cuddIsConstant(G)) return(F);
00551     if (F > G) { /* swap f and g */
00552         *f = G;
00553         *g = F;
00554     }
00555     return(NULL);
00556 
00557 } /* end of Cudd_addOr */

00572 DdNode *
00573 Cudd_addNand(
00574   DdManager * dd,
00575   DdNode ** f,
00576   DdNode ** g)
00577 {
00578     DdNode *F, *G;
00579 
00580     F = *f; G = *g;
00581     if (F == DD_ZERO(dd) || G == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(DD_ONE(dd));
00582     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) return(DD_ZERO(dd));
00583     if (F > G) { /* swap f and g */
00584         *f = G;
00585         *g = F;
00586     }
00587     return(NULL);
00588 
00589 } /* end of Cudd_addNand */

00604 DdNode *
00605 Cudd_addNor(
00606   DdManager * dd,
00607   DdNode ** f,
00608   DdNode ** g)
00609 {
00610     DdNode *F, *G;
00611 
00612     F = *f; G = *g;
00613     if (F == DD_ONE(dd) || G == DD_ONE(dd)) return(DD_ZERO(dd));
00614     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) return(DD_ONE(dd));
00615     if (F > G) { /* swap f and g */
00616         *f = G;
00617         *g = F;
00618     }
00619     return(NULL);
00620 
00621 } /* end of Cudd_addNor */

00636 DdNode *
00637 Cudd_addXor(
00638   DdManager * dd,
00639   DdNode ** f,
00640   DdNode ** g)
00641 {
00642     DdNode *F, *G;
00643 
00644     F = *f; G = *g;
00645     if (F == DD_ONE(dd) && G == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(DD_ONE(dd));
00646     if (G == DD_ONE(dd) && F == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(DD_ONE(dd));
00647     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) return(DD_ZERO(dd));
00648     if (F > G) { /* swap f and g */
00649         *f = G;
00650         *g = F;
00651     }
00652     return(NULL);
00653 
00654 } /* end of Cudd_addXor */

00669 DdNode *
00670 Cudd_addXnor(
00671   DdManager * dd,
00672   DdNode ** f,
00673   DdNode ** g)
00674 {
00675     DdNode *F, *G;
00676 
00677     F = *f; G = *g;
00678     if (F == DD_ONE(dd) && G == DD_ONE(dd)) return(DD_ONE(dd));
00679     if (G == DD_ZERO(dd) && F == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(DD_ONE(dd));
00680     if (cuddIsConstant(F) && cuddIsConstant(G)) return(DD_ZERO(dd));
00681     if (F > G) { /* swap f and g */
00682         *f = G;
00683         *g = F;
00684     }
00685     return(NULL);
00686 
00687 } /* end of Cudd_addXnor */

00707 DdNode *
00708 cuddAddApplyRecur(
00709   DdManager * dd,
00710   DdNode * (*op)(DdManager *, DdNode **, DdNode **),
00711   DdNode * f,
00712   DdNode * g)
00713 {
00714     DdNode *res,
00715            *fv, *fvn, *gv, *gvn,
00716            *T, *E;
00717     unsigned int ford, gord;
00718     unsigned int index;
00719     DdNode *(*cacheOp)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *);
00720 
00721     /* Check terminal cases. Op may swap f and g to increase the
00722      * cache hit ratio.
00723      */
00724     res = (*op)(dd,&f,&g);
00725     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00726 
00727     /* Check cache */
00728     cacheOp = (DdNode *(*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *)) op;
00729     res = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,cacheOp,f,g);
00730     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00731 
00732     /* Recursive Step */
00733     ford = cuddI(dd,f->index);
00734     gord = cuddI(dd,g->index);
00735     if (ford <= gord) {
00736         index = f->index;
00737         fv = cuddT(f);
00738         fvn = cuddE(f);
00739     } else {
00740         index = g->index;
00741         fv = fvn = f;
00742     }
00743     if (gord <= ford) {
00744         gv = cuddT(g);
00745         gvn = cuddE(g);
00746     } else {
00747         gv = gvn = g;
00748     }
00749 
00750     T = cuddAddApplyRecur(dd,op,fv,gv);
00751     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00752     cuddRef(T);
00753 
00754     E = cuddAddApplyRecur(dd,op,fvn,gvn);
00755     if (E == NULL) {
00756         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,T);
00757         return(NULL);
00758     }
00759     cuddRef(E);
00760 
00761     res = (T == E) ? T : cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)index,T,E);
00762     if (res == NULL) {
00763         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00764         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00765         return(NULL);
00766     }
00767     cuddDeref(T);
00768     cuddDeref(E);
00769 
00770     /* Store result */
00771     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,cacheOp,f,g,res);
00772 
00773     return(res);
00774 
00775 } /* end of cuddAddApplyRecur */
